text_block_list.text:
This month too, I shared the monthly schedule 
with Daiichi Ruby's butler, but―

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
――Dinner with will start at 18:00 on Thursday. 
French and Chinese classes are held on 
Fridays and Saturdays, respectively.

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
Is it correct that you want to cancel the play 
on Sunday? We will schedule a meeting with a new 
Italian teacher instead.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: No thanks.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Are you okay with this trainer? I'm going to 
arrange a schedule so it doesn't get in the 
way of training.
choice_data_list: There is plenty of time for training, but…

text_block_list.text:
Her schedule is planned minute by minute. 
Is there enough time for rest and her hobby?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
……If there is no objection, let's proceed. 
Well then, thank you for your continued 
support this month.

Since becoming Daiichi Ruby's personal trainer, 
I've been amazed at how busy her schedule is.

Other than daily training, there is also language lesson. 
Followed by goodwill exchanges with the business world 
which are important for the heir of the noble family.
choice_data_list: (I wonder if I can give her a little distraction…)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Preparation is complete. 
Is it okay to follow the usual routine?

I explained to Daichi Ruby about the sudden 
change of schedule, that I had an idea and take 
her outside of the school.

I lead Daiichi Ruby on a bicycle. 
Unlike the training course, the scenery 
changes every time you run.

I wonder if she feel better running on the open field. 
Suddenly I spotted something interesting and park my bike.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Hah… Hah…

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
choice_data_list: I'm thirsty, let's have a drink, shall we?

text_block_list.text:
I points to a honey drink shop across the 
street. The horse girls at the school were 
talking about being healed by the sweetness, but―

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …No thanks.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Sugar consumption is strictly controled. 
……you should know that, right?

I was flatly refused and returned to training. 
But I have no intention of giving up today.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Hah… Hah…

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……What is it this time.
choice_data_list: Look, there's a beautiful bird over there!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
……I see. 
Now let's continue the training.

After that, I continued to search for something 
that would catch Daiichi Ruby's interest, but―

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……Are we taking another break?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, if you don't mean to taunt me, 
please explain the purpose of today's training.
choice_data_list: Seeing different scenery can stimulate your brain―

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: In short.
choice_data_list: I thought it would be a good way to relax!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …In another word, shallow.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
May I? I have no qualms about striving to be 
worthy of my family.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I work hard every day because I have decided 
that it is necessary. Rather, it is your 
unnecessary concern that is hindering me.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
If you want results worthy of the name of your 
family, you should consider what you spend your 
limited time on.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Be brilliant. Be supreme. Always shine the brightest. 
That is my family's motto… therefore

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: There is no way I will ever betray your expectations.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
There is no time to waste. If you understand that, 
please don't worry unnecessarily in the future.

After returning to the academy and completed 
the usual training menu, Daiichi Ruby left for 
the next schedule.

There was no sense of sadness in her straight 
back, and I wondered if there is anything I can 
do to support her.
